annotations.description: It was a good decision to watch today's encounter. There has been more to see on the pitch than in most of the other games. The host team were better throughout the game. The home players attempted to beat the opposition's defence using mostly counter attacks. The away team tried to prevail using combination football.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Nothing more will happen in this game as the referee blows for full time.
Dante (Bayern Munich) is well placed to meet a cross and sends a difficult header towards the middle of the goal, but the goalkeeper reacts well to stop the effort.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Thiago Alcantara (Bayern Munich) swings in the corner, but it's comfortably cleared away.
Thiago Alcantara (Bayern Munich) fails to send a pass into the box as his effort is cut out. Bayern Munich have been awarded a corner kick.
Juan Bernat (Bayern Munich) sends a cross into the box, but Fabiano comes off his line to gather the ball.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 3 min. of stoppage time to be played.
Thiago Alcantara (Bayern Munich) delivers a lovely cross into the penalty area. Nevertheless, an opposition defender is alert and averts the danger with a brilliant clearance.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Thiago Alcantara (Bayern Munich) takes the corner which is cleared.

Juan Bernat (Bayern Munich) was all set to receive a beautiful pass into a promising position. However, one of the defenders makes a timely clearance. The ball is out of play. Bayern Munich win a corner kick.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals a substitution. Evandro (FC Porto) is brought on as a substitute for Ricardo Quaresma.
Thiago Alcantara (Bayern Munich) delivers a poor cross from a free kick as one of the defenders comfortably clears it away.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Carlos Velasco shows a yellow card to Danilo (FC Porto), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late. Bayern Munich will take a free kick.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance is 50092.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The manager has decided to make a substitution and Yacine Brahimi walks off the pitch to be replaced by Hernani (FC Porto).

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Thiago Alcantara (Bayern Munich) overhits the corner kick and none of his teammates can their head on it.

Thiago Alcantara (Bayern Munich) attempts to find some of his teammates with a dangerous pass from the edge of the box. The opponent's defence, however, intercepts the effort and clears the ball to safety. The ball is out of play and Bayern Munich manage to earn a corner.
Ricardo Quaresma (FC Porto) touches the ball with his hand.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: That's the end of the game for Oliver Torres, who is replaced by Ruben Neves (FC Porto).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Pep Guardiola has decided to make a change. Holger Badstuber (Bayern Munich) replaces Xabi Alonso.
Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich) sends a pass into the penalty area, but the opponent manages to cut it out.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Sebastian Rode (Bayern Munich) goes into the book for a horrible tackle. A yellow card is necessary in this case.
Carlos Velasco blows his whistle and signals a foul after Thiago Alcantara (Bayern Munich) brought his opponent down.
Sebastian Rode (Bayern Munich) shoots from the edge of the penalty area. The ball travels towards the bottom right corner, but Fabiano easily deals with the threat.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Alex Sandro passes the ball to the feet of Jackson Martinez (FC Porto), who has an empty net in front of him and has no problems in tapping the ball in. 3:1.
Ricardo Quaresma (FC Porto) sends in a lofted cross from a mid range free kick, but his poor effort goes out of play.
Jerome Boateng (Bayern Munich) commits a rough foul. Carlos Velasco stops the game and makes a call. FC Porto earn a free kick which could lead to a goal scoring opportunity.
Robert Lewandowski (Bayern Munich) fails to beat the offside trap and the linesman puts his flag up.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ricardo Quaresma (FC Porto) works the corner short instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.

Manuel Neuer pulls off a great save to deny Hector Herrera (FC Porto) after receiving a precise defence splitting pass. The effort is headed for the underside of the crossbar, but the goalkeeper dives superbly to stop it. Definitely the best save of this match so far! FC Porto force their opponents to concede a corner.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Mario Gotze goes off the pitch and Sebastian Rode (Bayern Munich) comes on.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Ricardo Quaresma (FC Porto) is cleared away by the defence.
Bayern Munich are bossing possession of the ball and make numerous short passes, but they finally lose possession after an error. FC Porto force a corner. They send men into the box.
The linesman raises his flag. Ricardo Quaresma (FC Porto) is adjudged offside.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ricardo Quaresma (FC Porto) takes the corner with a short pass.
Yacine Brahimi (FC Porto) tries to send the ball in front of the goal, but the opposition's defence averts the threat. The referee signals a corner kick to FC Porto.
A crossfield pass from Mario Gotze (Bayern Munich) fails to find any of his teammates. The ball goes out of play and FC Porto will have a goal kick.
A cross from a mid range free kick, taken by FC Porto, is intercepted by one of the defenders.
Carlos Velasco interrupts the game for a tactical foul by Juan Bernat (Bayern Munich). There is a free kick near the sideline to FC Porto.
Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich) performs a sliding tackle but catches his opponent's legs. The referee blows his whistle for an infringement.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The game restarts for the second half.

This is how football should be full of action, thrilling moments and spectacular opportunities. And we have only had the first 45 minutes, so the expectations for the second half are high. Even first half from both sides, and they've both had chances. The home players attempt to beat the opposition's defence using mostly counter attacks. The away team tries to prevail using combination football.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle to end the first half and the players are now heading to their respective dressing rooms.

Casemiro (FC Porto) reacts well and displays good awareness near the penalty spot to get on the end of a cross from the free kick. He jumps high and produces a header which goes well over the crossbar.
Mario Gotze (Bayern Munich) is penalised after knocking an opponent down. FC Porto get a free kick.
The Bayern Munich players keep the ball and are exchanging a combination of passes. They are waiting for gaps in the defence to open up.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Philipp Lahm (Bayern Munich) has tested the patience of referee Carlos Velasco and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Alex Sandro (FC Porto) sees a yellow card from Carlos Velasco after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.
Robert Lewandowski (Bayern Munich) commits an ugly challenge. The referee sees it and immediately blows his whistle.
OFF THE BAR! Alex Sandro (FC Porto) found himself some space to take a shot from just outside the box, but Manuel Neuer came up with a save and tipped the ball onto the bar.
Rafinha (Bayern Munich) deprives his opponent of the ball, but the referee blows his whistle for a foul. He's not happy with the decision!

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Casemiro (FC Porto) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Carlos Velasco didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's in the back of the net! Jerome Boateng plays it into the box, and Thiago Alcantara (Bayern Munich) gets on the end of the cross to put it into the back of the net. 2:1.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: A horde of players are waiting inside the penalty area for a cross from the corner, but Xabi Alonso (Bayern Munich) takes it short.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Xabi Alonso (Bayern Munich) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender. Bayern Munich win a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Xabi Alonso (Bayern Munich) is cleared by the opposition's defence. Bayern Munich earn a corner.
Juan Bernat (Bayern Munich) tries to slide the ball through to a teammate but it's well blocked by a defender. Bayern Munich have been awarded a corner kick.
Rafinha (Bayern Munich) sends a long ball in, but Fabiano comfortably gathers the ball.
Mario Gotze (Bayern Munich) produces a lovely ball into the penalty area but the defender manages to intercept and comfortably averts the danger.
Yacine Brahimi (FC Porto) manages to dispossess his opponent of the ball, but he commits a foul in the process and the referee blows his whistle.
Carlos Velasco blows his whistle after Casemiro (FC Porto) brings one of his opponents down with a strong tackle.
A long ball forward to Jackson Martinez (FC Porto) is intercepted.
Jackson Martinez (FC Porto) blasts the ball high over the crossbar.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: A yellow card for a tackle by Juan Bernat (Bayern Munich). Carlos Velasco doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
Xabi Alonso (Bayern Munich) sends a lofted pass from the resulting free kick, but fails to hit the ball properly and his effort goes out of play.
Hector Herrera (FC Porto) holds his opponent to prevent him from getting the ball and the referee blows for a foul after seeing the whole situation. Bayern Munich have a free kick.
Referee Carlos Velasco sees the trip by Alex Sandro (FC Porto) and doesn't hesitate to blow his whistle.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: GOAL! A terrible mistake leads to a goal. The defender ends up losing possession, allowing Ricardo Quaresma (FC Porto) to pick up the ball before slotting it into the back of the net to make it 2:0.

Robert Lewandowski (Bayern Munich) has a big opportunity to score! He climbs highest deep inside the penalty box and strikes a powerful header towards the goal. Next time he should aim better as his effort flies narrowly over the bar.
Ricardo Quaresma (FC Porto) brings his opponent down. Carlos Velasco has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle for a foul. A free kick has been awarded to Bayern Munich.
Bayern Munich play a few nice passes from player to player, but their possession doesn't last long as an opposition player intercepts a pass.
Handball by Philipp Lahm (Bayern Munich).

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Ricardo Quaresma (FC Porto) makes no mistake from the penalty spot after firing the ball into the bottom left corner of the goal to give the goalkeeper no chance!
Ricardo Quaresma (FC Porto) is heading towards the penalty spot to take it.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Booking. Manuel Neuer (Bayern Munich) receives a caution from the referee.

annotations.label: penalty
annotations.description: Poor challenge! Manuel Neuer (Bayern Munich) is penalised for tripping and Carlos Velasco blows his whistle. The referee gives a penalty kick to FC Porto!

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half has just begun.
The players are out at last! FC Porto will take the kick off.
Let us introduce today's referee to you, and it's Carlos Velasco.
